Posts.Title: Four in the morning

Posts.Content: I had that a few weeks ago. Absolutely no sleep at all and was getting quick panicky. Lot better now though it does take an hour or two to get to sleep! I've been reading through all the posts on the site from the beginning. It's been very interesting!
